# Reference Project Rules
This project serves as a showcase for various OpenCode configurations.

## Project Structure
- `.opencode/agent/` - Custom subagents.
- `.opencode/command/` - Custom TUI commands.
- `.opencode/skill/` - Reusable skills.

## Guidelines
- Follow the patterns defined in custom agents.
- For detailed architecture rules, refer to @.opencode/skill/architecture-audit/references/patterns.md when requested.
- Use the `/verify` command to check environment health.
